title: Apple TV app now available to hotel guests through Philips MediaSuite TVs
content:
PPDS, the supplier of Philips TVs, is now offering the Apple TV app on a range of Philips MediaSuite hospitality TVs. Hotel guests can now watch their favorite Apple TV+ shows and movies right from their hotel room TV. 

more…

The post Apple TV app now available to hotel guests through Philips MediaSuite TVs appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Philips has announced that the Apple TV app is now offered on a range of Philips MediaSuite hospitality TVs.
